import { useEffect, useState, useRef } from 'react' import Loader from 'react-loaders' import AnimatedLetters from '../AnimatedLetters' import './index.scss' import emailjs from '@emailjs/browser' const Contact = () => { const [letterClass, setLetterClass] = useState('text-animate') const refForm = useRef useEffect(() => { setTimeout(() => { setLetterClass('text-animate-hover') }, 3000) }, []) const sendEmail = (e) => { e.preventDefault() emailjs .sendForm( 'gmail', 'template_y7xdqd2', reform ) } return ( <>

-- Contact me using the form below -- --

) } export default Contact
